text:
@realDonaldTrump @JHoganGidley 1 tanked economy
2 botched COVID-19 response
3 Glorified Racism
5 Gassed peaceful protestors for a BS photo op holding an upside-down bible and didn't even know it.

That's one helluva thing or 5 to run on, son.
